content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One of the keys to Epic Games' success is their dedication to innovation and collaboration. That's why they've partnered with EPAM. Together, these two companies are working to create the next generation of gaming experiences, using cutting-edge technology and a shared passion for gaming.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"letter-spacing\":\"0.0px\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thanks to the partnership with EPAM, Epic Games is able to leverage the latest advancements in artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data analytics to create immersive, interactive worlds that players can't get enough of. From the stunning graphics of their flagship game, Fortnite, to the thrilling gameplay of titles like Gears of War and Unreal Tournament, Epic Games is always pushing the envelope and creating unforgettable gaming experiences.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"letter-spacing\":\"0.0px\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The results of our work are everywhere. \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"letter-spacing\":\"0.0px\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"From Unreal Engine to EOS, a store where you can purchase your favorite games, to Fortnite -  a world of many experiences, featuring crossplay with millions of players around the world.\\r\\nWe impact a 400M-player gaming community with three billion social connections. \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"letter-spacing\":\"0.0px\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is proud to have been part of Epic Games’ story since before the creation of Fortnite. Through its big data, software engineering and AWS expertise, EPAM has collaborated with Epic Games to provide the flexibility, reliability and scalability needed to continue to push the boundaries of online gaming.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"letter-spacing\":\"0.0px\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"letter-spacing\":\"0.0px\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Link:  \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.epam.com/our-work/case-studies/epic-games-transforming-the-gaming-industry\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Games: Transforming The Gaming Industry\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"letter-spacing\":\"0.0px\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":141344,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e358373-68d5-4caf-9762-5a97019f2152/epic3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7e358373-68d5-4caf-9762-5a97019f2152/epic3.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"epic3.png\",\"name\":\"epic3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7e358373-68d5-4caf-9762-5a97019f2152\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":368.18906250000003},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
